question: Who among the following won gold medal in 21St Federation Cup National Senior Athletics Championship?
explanation: Sudha Singh won a gold medal in the women's 3000 m steeplechase at 21 St Federation Cup National Senior Athletics Championship. She clocked 10 minutes 03.01 seconds to finish over a hundred meters ahead of Uttar Pradesh Parul Chaudhary (10:18.10) in the 3000m women's steeplechase while Chinta Yadav of Uttar Pradesh claimed bronze with a time of 10:21.20.
